setTableFormat

public void setTableFormat(RangeStyle rs,
                           int selection)
format the selection part of the pivot table

Parameters:
rs - formatting object
selection - part of the pivot table 0-BlankColumnHeader 2-Data 3-all 4-TopLeft

setConditionalFormat

public void setConditionalFormat(ConditionFormat conditionFormat,
                                 int dataFiled,
                                 int selection)
apply the conditional formatting to the pivot table

Parameters:
conditionFormat - conditional formatting
dataFiled - data field index
selection - conditional type to be applied 0 - Selected cells 1 - All cells showing "#DATAFIELD" values 2 - All cells showing "#DATAFIELD" values for "#ROW_AREA_FIELDS" and "#COL_AREA_FIELDS"
